creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: pitcher with saucer, with scalloped edges; vertical panel of glazing that alternate peach and pale blue, with the pale blue sections containing delicate linear vines, outlined in dark purple glazing; gray metallic handle; some of edges on saucer are folded inward; same delicate vine pattern on blue section of saucer, with dark purple blurred shapes; two metallic bands on sides of saucer, with raised metallic lines; mottled peach area, with gray shading on opposite side
signed: black pigment on bottom of both pieces: GALLOWAY
title: Pitcher and saucer
